product_name: Sugoi Moxie Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The wide, smooth waistband and soft, breathable fabric of the women's Sugoi Moxie capri pants makes them comfortable to wear while running your favorite trails or training hard at the gym. Lightweight, durable nylon/spandex material wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, keeping you comfortable when you start to perspire. Sugoi Moxie capri pants feature a snug, supportive fit with loose cuffs; wide, smooth waistband lies flat against skin. The women's Sugoi Moxie capri pants feature an inside key pocket at waist. Closeout.
short_description: The wide, smooth waistband and soft, breathable fabric of the women's Sugoi Moxie capri pants makes them comfortable to wear while running your favorite trails or training hard at the gym.
